integrated.translation[0].definitions[0]: an integrated system, institution etc combines many different groups, ideas, or parts in a way that works well
integrated.translation[1].definitions[0]: an integrated system, organization etc combines two or more different parts, activities etc in a way that works well
Labour promised an integrated transport system to cover the whole country.
Europe continues its effort to build an integrated market with uniform tax and business regulation.
integrated.translation[1].definitions[1]: an integrated part of a product is not separate from the rest of the product
The videophone contains an integrated camera and video screen.
integrated.translation[1].definitions[2]: an integrated company performs all the activities related to producing and selling its products, rather than just some of these activities
Itâ€™s an integrated oil company, with production activity as well as refining and marketing operations.
